#### Teaching
**undergraduate**
  * [Croatian Language in the 19th Century (215163)](https://www.fhs.hr/en/course/clit1c_b) - Lecturer in charge
  * [Croatian Morphology (188064)](https://www.fhs.hr/en/course/cromor) - Lecturer in charge
  * [Croatian orthography (213973)](https://www.fhs.hr/en/course/croort) - Lecturer in charge
  * [Croatian Phonology (188063)](https://www.fhs.hr/en/course/cropho) - Lecturer in charge
  * [History of the Croatian Standard Language (188081)](https://www.fhs.hr/en/course/hotcsl_b) - Lecturer in charge


**graduate**
  * [Croatian Language Policy (226960)](https://www.fhs.hr/en/course/clp_a) - Lecturer in charge
  * [Croatian Linguistic Prescription (201776)](https://www.fhs.hr/en/course/clp) - Lecturer in charge
  * [Lexicology and Lexicography of the Croatian Language (147174)](https://www.fhs.hr/en/course/lalotcl_a) - Lecturer in charge
  * [Word Formation in the Croatian Language (201805)](https://www.fhs.hr/en/course/wfitcl_a) - Lecturer in charge


#### Biography
Born in 1969. Studied at the University of Mannheim where he got his doctoral degree in 2005. Employed at the Centre for Croatian Studies, University of Zagreb. He has presented at numerous scientific conferences in Croatia and abroad and published several scientific and professional papers.
